channel.title: Gameframe?
channel.description:
[b]Q:[/b] Will you give each player a choice between the 317, 459, and 474 game frames? [b]Mod Philip:[/b] We won't be giving a choice initially. If we get more votes, we'll be able to make more changes in the future.
Your opinions on a game frame update?

item.title: Gameframe?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:7, topic:493263”]Lol, why get hung up on something of minute importance?[/quote]I wasn’t really get hung up on it. It’s a thread about the gameframe, so I briefly mentioned my thoughts on it. I’m honestly really happy with the game either way and I really shouldn’t be mad about anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Gameframe?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:3, topic:493263”][quote author=Lin link=topic=611496.msg4236339#msg4236339 date=1361579314]
It better happen. They chose the ugliest old-school one they could’ve.
[/quote]
What about the one that came out with summoning? That one was pretty disgusting.

http://i49.tinypic.com/n6yutx.png[/quote]I like it. It all blends and fits together well. In the current one, there are old icons mixed with new ones, bad spacing issues, and an ugly blend on the backgrounds.

Read full topic
